artist: Designer: Johan Rohde; Manufacturer: Georg Jensen, Copenhagen, Denmark
creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: covered coffee, pear shaped body, lower 1/2 adorned by wide band of stylized leaves rectangular in shape with point and ribs; ribbed dark wood handle, joined at top of pot by organic spiraling forms; ball at top of cover
markings: engraved at bottom long side near edge: [L.W.]; [STERLING] (crown)/oval [GEORG JENSEN] [251c] oval [GI/925/S] [DENMARK] oval [J\'/\'R(?)]
title: Coffeepot from the "Cosmos" coffee and tea service
